description:
CD/DVD ISO images authoring software

Active@ ISO Manager is easy-to use software to author, edit and burn CD/DVD-ROM
ISO images compatible with the ISO 9660 / Joliet standards. You can create ISO
images from either existing CD/DVD-ROMs or from a set of existing files and
folders.

Command line parameters are supported to automate the ISO authoring/burning
process. In addition, it lets you to extract files from ISO images as well as
edit ISO content and then re-assemble ISO images.
- Maintenance release
